```{r}
#| label: setup
#| include: false

devtools::load_all()

dat_raw <- openxlsx::read.xlsx(
  "../extdata/merged_cleaned_tmp_1_subset_wks_relabelled_normals_3 2.xlsx"
)
# age range in raw data for inline reporting
age_range <- range(dat_raw$AgeAtDelivery) |> round(0)
age_range <- paste0(age_range[1], "-", age_range[2])

dat <- ekg.preg::ekg_normal
# number of pt, preg, and ekg for inline reporting
n_ekg_preg <- extract_n_ekg(
  dat |> 
    dplyr::filter(Pregnant == "Pregnant")
)
n_ekg_not_preg <- extract_n_ekg(
  dat |> 
    dplyr::filter(Pregnant == "Not Pregnant")
)

prop_ekg_not_preg <- paste0(
  round(
    (n_ekg_not_preg / (n_ekg_preg + n_ekg_not_preg)) * 100,
    2
  ),
  "%"
)

prop_ekg_preg <- paste0(
  round(
    (n_ekg_preg / (n_ekg_preg + n_ekg_not_preg)) * 100,
    2
  ),
  "%"
)

# ekg during 2wks postpartum
n_ekg_tri4 <- extract_n_ekg(dat, trimester = 4)
```
